## ğŸ“‹ What This Does

The Manus Global Knowledge System enforces:

1. **Initialization Check** - Ensures system is ready
2. **Cost Gate** - Blocks expensive operations when cheaper alternatives exist
3. **Knowledge Lookup** - Reuses existing work (>80% similarity)
4. **Execution Router** - Routes to OpenAI (cheap) or Manus (necessary)
5. **Quality Validator** - Validates output quality (â‰¥80%)
6. **Continuous Learning** - Learns and adapts from outcomes
